missing_authorization_header.title: Authorization header is missing, unable to authenticate
missing_authorization_header.detail: An `Authorization` header with the `Bearer` scheme is required to authenticate the request.

unauthorized.title: Unauthorized Access
unauthorized.detail: You have to provide an Authorization header with a valid token in order to access this resource.

forbidden.title: Resource Access Forbidden
forbidden.detail: You are not allowed to access this resource with the token or credentials you have provided.

not_found.title: Resource Not Found
not_found.detail: The resource you are trying to reach does not exist or has been disabled or deleted from our services.
